20110109160130.000|20110109160131.000|CC1|IT DID STRIKE PART OF HER

20110109160133.000|20110109160135.000|CC1|TO COMMANDS, MEDICAL EXPERTS    
20110109160135.000|20110109160136.000|CC1|SAY THAT DOES NOT RULE OUT      
20110109160136.000|20110109160138.000|CC1|THE POSSIBILITY OF LONG-TERM    
20110109160138.000|20110109160139.000|CC1|DAMAGE.                         
20110109160139.000|20110109160141.000|CC1|WE HAVE ALSO LEARNED THAT       
20110109160141.000|20110109160142.000|CC1|GABRIELLE GIFFORDS WAS THE      
20110109160142.000|20110109160144.000|CC1|INTENDED TARGET OF THIS         
20110109160144.000|20110109160144.000|CC1|ATTACK.                         
20110109160144.000|20110109160146.000|CC1|IN ALL, 19 PEOPLE WERE SHOT.    
20110109160146.000|20110109160148.000|CC1|SIX OF THEM KILLED.             
20110109160148.000|20110109160150.000|CC1|INCLUDING FEDERAL JUDGE JOHN    
20110109160150.000|20110109160152.000|CC1|ROLL, WHO WE JUST LEARNED       
20110109160152.000|20110109160153.000|CC1|ATTENDED THIS EVENT AND         
20110109160153.000|20110109160155.000|CC1|DECIDED TO ATTEND IT JUST AN    
20110109160155.000|20110109160156.000|CC1|HOUR BEFORE IT STARTED.         
20110109160156.000|20110109160159.000|CC1|A 9-YEAR-OLD GIRL, CHRISTINA    
20110109160159.000|20110109160200.000|CC1|GREEN, WAS ALSO KILLED.         
20110109160200.000|20110109160201.000|CC1|SHE WAS BROUGHT TO THE EVENT    
20110109160201.000|20110109160202.000|CC1|BY HER NEIGHBOR.

20110109160427.000|20110109160429.000|CC1|REPUBLICAN AND DEMOCRATIC

20110109160430.000|20110109160432.000|CC1|>> OUR PRAYERS AND THOUGHTS     
20110109160432.000|20110109160433.000|CC1|ARE WITH ALL OF THEM, ALL OF    
20110109160433.000|20110109160435.000|CC1|THEIR FAMILIES.                 
20110109160435.000|20110109160436.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN GIFFORDS IS A     
20110109160436.000|20110109160438.000|CC1|GREAT PATRIOTIC AMERICAN,       
20110109160438.000|20110109160439.000|CC1|REPRESENTATIVE OF THE           
20110109160439.000|20110109160441.000|CC1|CONGRESS OF A NEW GENERATION    
20110109160441.000|20110109160442.000|CC1|OF LEADERS.                     
20110109160442.000|20110109160444.000|CC1|>> Reporter: GIFFORDS HAS A     
20110109160444.000|20110109160446.000|CC1|REPUTATION AS A CENTRIST        
20110109160446.000|20110109160446.000|CC1|DEMOCRAT.                       
20110109160446.000|20110109160447.000|CC1|SHE WAS ONE OF 19 HOUSE         
20110109160447.000|20110109160449.000|CC1|DEMOCRATS WHO ACTUALLY VOTED    
20110109160449.000|20110109160450.000|CC1|AGAINST NANCY PELOSI AS         
20110109160450.000|20110109160452.000|CC1|SPEAKER JUST LAST WEEK.         
20110109160452.000|20110109160454.000|CC1|SHE IS A PRO-SECOND AMENDMENT   
20110109160454.000|20110109160455.000|CC1|GUN OWNER.                      
20110109160455.000|20110109160456.000|CC1|SHE GAVE HER LAST INTERVIEW     
20110109160456.000|20110109160458.000|CC1|TO FOX NEWS JUST FRIDAY         
20110109160458.000|20110109160459.000|CC1|BEFORE THE ATTACK.              
20110109160459.000|20110109160502.000|CC1|>> YOU KNOW, ACTUALLY, AS A     
20110109160502.000|20110109160503.000|CC1|FORMER REPUBLICAN, YOU KNOW,    
20110109160503.000|20110109160504.000|CC1|I CONSIDER MYSELF SOMEONE WHO   
20110109160504.000|20110109160506.000|CC1|IS PRETTY IN THE MIDDLE, AND    
20110109160506.000|20110109160507.000|CC1|A BLUE DOG DEMOCRAT, AND ONE    
20110109160507.000|20110109160509.000|CC1|THAT IS INTERESTED IN MAKING    
20110109160509.000|20110109160511.000|CC1|SURE THAT OUR COUNTRY           
20110109160511.000|20110109160513.000|CC1|MAINTAINS OUR PROSPERITY.

20110109160517.000|20110109160518.000|CC1|OVER OTHER COUNTRIES.           
20110109160518.000|20110109160519.000|CC1|>> Bret: THE NEW HOUSE          
20110109160519.000|20110109160521.000|CC1|SPEAKER JOHN BOEHNER ISSUED A   
20110109160521.000|20110109160522.000|CC1|STATEMENT SAYING IN PART AN     
20110109160522.000|20110109160524.000|CC1|ATTACK ON ONE WHO SERVES IS     
20110109160524.000|20110109160525.000|CC1|AN ATTACK ON ALL WHO SERVE.     
20110109160525.000|20110109160527.000|CC1|AND PRESIDENT OBAMA NOTED       
20110109160527.000|20110109160529.000|CC1|THAT THE HORROR OF THIS

20110109160533.000|20110109160536.000|CC1|FORUMS: THE TOWN HALL STYLE

20110109160536.000|20110109160538.000|CC1|>> GABBY WAS DOING WHAT SHE

20110109160540.000|20110109160543.000|CC1|HOPES, AND CONCERNS OF HER      
20110109160543.000|20110109160543.000|CC1|NEIGHBORS.                      
20110109160543.000|20110109160545.000|CC1|THAT IS THE ESSENCE OF WHAT     
20110109160545.000|20110109160548.000|CC1|OUR DEMOCRACY IS ALL ABOUT.

20110109161330.000|20110109161330.000|CC1|COUNTRY.

20110109165159.000|20110109165201.000|CC1|GET IT OVER WITH AND SEND IT    
20110109165201.000|20110109165203.000|CC1|TO OBLIVION IN THE SENATE.      
20110109165203.000|20110109165205.000|CC1|THERE ARE NO HEARINGS.          
20110109165205.000|20110109165206.000|CC1|THEY HAVEN'T COME UP WITH A     
20110109165206.000|20110109165207.000|CC1|REPLACEMENT BILL.
